attributes.action: when a prime minister has to resign it should be to the public to vote
attributes.additional_details: If a prime minister has to resign or is forced out of office it shouldnt be upto that political party to make a new prime minister it should be the public that decide because they never voted for the replacement.
attributes.background: The should call a general election as soon as possible

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a General Election within 100 days of the new PM being appointed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621931

Impose new requirements on replacing the Prime Minister and subsequent election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623200

Require a referendum on whether to hold an early general election if PM changes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623922
